articles.title: Metallica, Mariah Carey headline Global Citizen NYC concert - The Associated Press
articles.description: NEW YORK (AP) — Metallica, Mariah Carey and The Jonas Brothers will headline a free concert in New York’s Central Park next month marking the 10th anniversary of the Global Citizen Festival organized by the international nonprofit fighting extreme poverty.
